GeneralInformation.School Vision: Rooted in Truth and Charity, nurtured for academic, aesthetic, physical, social and moral growth.
GeneralInformation.School Mission: With God in our presence, we strive to create a family of compassionate persons imbibed with integrity. We strive to cultivate confident and independent learners who are adaptable and gracious.
GeneralInformation.School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: Hai Sing Catholic School was founded in 1959 by the Franciscan Missionaries of Mary (FMM). It is a 58-year old Catholic School with a proud and distinguished history, a school which believes in developing each HaiSian to his fullest potential, to be truthful and to have compassion for others.  HaiSians walk the Way of Truth through Living for Others.  HaiSians serve the young and the elderly in the community who need comfort and support. Teachers of Hai Sing are exemplary in their love for teaching and in moulding students to be persons of character and resilience. Teachers are role models of learning and life long learning. They employ the latest technology to better engage students in learning while remaining accessible to students who need extra help after school. The school is also recognized for its innovative culture, its teaching methods and emphasis on discipline and values. Together with parents and alumni as partners, Hai Sing Catholic School is poised to meet the challenges of nurturing the young to be good citizens who are able to navigate the many complexities of life, to remain adaptable, gracious, compassionate and persons of integrity.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: GOVERNMENT-AIDED SCH / CO-ED SCHOOL / SINGLE SESSION

School Distinctive Programmes.STEM: Applied Learning in Robotics and Engineering
School Distinctive Programmes.Community & Youth Leadership: Developing Leadership Competencies in Every HaiSian

SpecialProgrammes.Special Student Development Programmes O: The school offers the Applied Learning Programme (ALP)in Robotics and Engineering which nurtures 21st Century Competencies in Critical & Inventive Thinking. The ALP comprises the Robotics Proficiency Programme, the Science Inquiry and Applied Mathematics Modelling Programme, and the Design Engineering Programmes. Students have been recognised internationally for their achievements in Robotics. The school's Learning for Life Programme (LLP), Developing Leadership Competencies in Every HaiSian, nurtures the 21st Century Competencies in Communication, Collaboration & Information skills in our students. Students develop their leadership potential through the Community Youth Leadership Programme. The school offers student-centric and values-driven programmes to develop Confident, Independent, Adaptable, and Gracious HaiSians. The HAI Experiential Week, Hai Aesthetics Programme and National Youth Achievement Award (NYAA) Programme, Project I together with the Future Problem Solving and Mathematics Olympiad Programmes, enrich the learning experiences. Overseas trips to China, Japan and Malaysia imbue our students with Civic Literacy, Global Awareness and Cross-Cultural Skills. The School educates HaiSians to protect the environment through its nationally-recognised 3R Programmes like the Hai Mangrove Digital Trail. Supplementary academic programmes provide learning support for students who need special coaching.
